TopicTitle: Kerbal last names - replacing "Kerman" with random (last) name generator.

Articles.Content: I never was a fan of fact that last name of all kerbals is simply "Kerman" and I would vastly prefer to see it generated randomly just like the first names - what is the point after all - if we giving them all same surname we can simply remove it completely and leave first name alone. What everyone else thinks about it? Better to stay with "Kerman" or replace it by random generated last names?
i second this idea. i didn't like that they all had the same last name either.
I think it's a holdover from the good ol' days when Bill, Bob, and Jebediah were the only Kerbals in the universe. I'm sure they'll get around to it, but it's low on their ppriority list I'm sure.
I'd like to see more last names too. I find it a bit weird they're all "related".

I am kinda used to them being all Kermans. In my opinion they could drop the last name completely, the're all Jeb, Bill, Bob, etc for us anyway.

Maybe we could pretend Kerman is not a name but a rank, something like Captain. You must become Kerman before they allow you to apply for going to space...

For me TextEdit on OSX is my friend:

Go into the settings .cgf file

Scroll down until you find the kerbal names

pick one that hardly pops up

Change it's name

Copy and paste your new identity close to Jeb, Bill, and Bob or ahead of them.
